SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.control

Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.control.ManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaffControllerInterface
public class ManagerController extends Object implements StaffControllerInterface
Controller for manager-specific operations: approving/rejecting applications, handling withdrawals, managing visibility of managed projects, and handling officer registrations.

    • approveOfficerRegistration

      public boolean approveOfficerRegistration(Registration registration)
      Approves a pending officer registration. Delegates checks (slots, overlap) and status change to RegistrationController.
      Parameters:
      registration - The registration to approve.
      Returns:
      true if successfully approved, false otherwise.

    • rejectOfficerRegistration

      public boolean rejectOfficerRegistration(Registration registration)
      Rejects a pending officer registration. Delegates status change to RegistrationController.
      Parameters:
      registration - The registration to reject.
      Returns:
      true if successfully rejected, false otherwise.
